title: Order Charger Replica
paragraphs: The Order Charger Replica is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is a reskin of the Splat Charger, and a direct successor to the Splatoon 2 Hero Charger Replica.
The Order Charger Replica is designed to look like a simplified version of the Splat Charger, containing only white and gray colors.
The Order Charger Replica comes with Splat Bombs and Ink Vac. The Order Charger Replica's stats, sub weapon, and special weapon are identical to those of the Splat Charger.
To unlock the Order Charger Replica, the player must complete Side Order with Marie's Palette.
- Along with the Hero Charger Replica, the Order Charger Replica is the only variant of the Splat Charger to not have a scoped version.
